Class MedicalRecordController

java.lang.Object
com.demo.pet.controllers.MedicalRecordController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/records") public class MedicalRecordController extends Object
REST controller for managing medical record operations in the Pet Clinic system.

Exposes endpoints for CRUD operations and retrieval of records by pet or user.

See info about Controllers Overview: Controllers Overview

See info about Controller Annotations: Controller Annotation

Since:
1.0
See Also:

      public MedicalRecordController()

  • Method Details

    • getAllRecords

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or hasRole('DOCTOR') or hasRole('STAFF')") @GetMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MedicalRecordDTO>> getAllRecords()
      Retrieves all medical records.

      Accessible by ADMIN, DOCTOR, and STAFF roles.

      Returns:
      List of all medical records

    • getRecordById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MedicalRecordDTO> getRecordById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a medical record by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The record ID.
      Returns:
      The MedicalRecordDTO object.

    • getRecordsByPetId

      @GetMapping("/pet/{petId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MedicalRecordDTO>> getRecordsByPetId(@PathVariable Long petId)
      Retrieves medical records by pet ID.
      Parameters:
      petId - The pet ID.
      Returns:
      List of MedicalRecordDTO objects associated with the pet.

    • getRecordsByUserId

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MedicalRecordDTO>> getRecordsByUserId(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Retrieves all medical records for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecordDTO objects.

    • addRecord

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or hasRole('DOCTOR')") @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MedicalRecordDTO> addRecord(@RequestBody MedicalRecordDTO dto)
      Adds a new medical record.

      Accessible to users with ADMIN or DOCTOR roles.

      Parameters:
      dto - The MedicalRecordDTO object.
      Returns:
      The created MedicalRecordDTO object.

    • updateRecord

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or hasRole('DOCTOR')") @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MedicalRecordDTO> updateRecord(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody MedicalRecordDTO dto)
      Updates an existing medical record.

      Accessible to users with ADMIN or DOCTOR roles.

      Parameters:
      id - The record ID.
      dto - The MedicalRecordDTO object with updated data.
      Returns:
      The updated MedicalRecordDTO object.

    • deleteRecord

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or hasRole('DOCTOR')") @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MedicalRecordDTO> deleteRecord(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a medical record by ID.

      Accessible to users with ADMIN or DOCTOR roles.

      Parameters:
      id - The record ID.
      Returns:
      The deleted MedicalRecordDTO object.

    • getMyRecords

      @GetMapping("/my-records") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MedicalRecordDTO>> getMyRecords()
      Retrieves the medical records of the currently authenticated user.

      Accessible to all authenticated users.

      Returns:
      List of MedicalRecordDTO objects for the current user.
